backend/main.mo: Actor stores contact details and lead forms with queries for retrieval and a method to submit new leads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting branding consistency requirements and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components and sections for the King Kingdom website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens for light and dark themes with global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, favicon, fonts, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all King Kingdom sections, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/con: Displays a list of phone numbers with optional icon and separator using CONTACT_INFO.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Fea: Reusable icon wrapper for Lucide icons with styled container.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Fixed WhatsApp CTA button linking to configured WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer showing branding, quick links, contact info, and dynamic social icons.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Gal: Lightbox modal for viewing gallery images with close button.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky navigation bar with logo, section scroll links, CTAs, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: Shows an About section describing CCS, its mission, vision, and values in two info cards.
Displays a construction photo gallery with clickable images that open in a lightbox.
Provides a contact form with validation and WhatsApp submission plus company contact details.
Hero section with main headline, service summary, and buttons that scroll to contact or portfolio sections.
Renders four highlight feature cards showcasing construction strengths like quality and team.
Shows a grid of portfolio projects with images, titles, and locations.
Displays a six-step workflow explaining the construction process from contact to handover.
Renders a services grid listing various construction-related offerings with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Displays reasons to choose the company using a grid of icons, titles, and descriptions within a styled section.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Renders a top contact bar with phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, hours, and address using CONTACT_INFO.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Defines centralized contact information including phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, address, and business hours.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Provides social media link configurations and a helper to return only active links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook managing identity state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables, color tokens, and utility classes for the app theme.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp message URLs using configured contact info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, containers, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versioning, feature tracking, logo requirements, and project settings.
